query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(data_last_updated) AS month, count(*) AS count, category, department_name WHERE data_last_updated >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, category, department_name ORDER BY month, category, department_name

month.description: Month of the last update, aggregated by year and month.

count.description: Count of city lands updated in a given month.

category.description: Category of the department that has jurisdiction over the land, helpful for categorization of land usage.

department_name.description: Name of the department that exercises jurisdiction over the city land.

table_metadata.title: City Lands
table_metadata.description: This dataset contains information about city-owned lands managed by various agencies within and outside the jurisdiction of the City and County of San Francisco.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: City planners, real estate departments, and policy makers involved in city land management and development.

whom_it_may_interest: City planners, real estate departments, policy makers
title: City Lands
